Articles.Content:
I slapped together a parody of 99 Problems and made a video for it. I don't have decent recording equipment, just a web cam so it doesn't have the best audio.

99 Boosters

http://youtu.be/C4QV0FKuTLg

Why not 99 Red Boosters?

:edit listend to it all now, not bad
Thanks. Webcams really don't pick up acoustics all that well, plus it is the first game video I have ever made. If anyone has any tips for future work or for a remix, it would be welcomed.
